attributes.action: adopt the proposal of allowing every voter to donate £3 per year to a party of their choice via the ballot paper in a General Election and ban political donations from all other sources. It would be open to the voter to make the donation to a party other than the one they voted for.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The aim of this proposal is to empower the voter.
The total amount of funds given to all political parties each year has not exceeded £60 millian pounds. (This data was taken from Electoral Comissions website.)
There were 45.2 million parliamentary electors (in 2008) therefore ample potential funding will be available. (This data was taken from the Gateway to UK National Statistics website.)
This idea is based on a recommendation in the ‘Power to the People: the report of Power, an Independent Inquiry into Britain’s Democracy’
